thread.title: Chelsea news: Barcelona secretly approached Marco Verratti to discuss transfer | Metro News
thread.title_full: Chelsea news: Barcelona secretly approached Marco Verratti to discuss transfer | Metro News

author: Chris Davie For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Chelsea news: Barcelona secretly approached Marco Verratti to discuss transfer | Metro News
text:
Barcelona approached Marco Verratti over transfer gossip Chris Davie for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 22 Feb 2017 4:36 pm Marco Verratti remains on Barcelona’s radar. (Getty Images) 
Barcelona remain keen on signing Marco Verratti having approached the Paris Saint-Germain midfielder about a transfer last summer, according to reports. 
Sport claim that Ariedo Braida, who is Barca’s director of international football, met with the Italian to discuss his future on the Spanish island of Formentera. 
Barcelona did not have the funds to lure the 24-year-old from PSG but has made it clear that Camp Nou would be his ideal destination if he were to move. 
The report claims that Barcelona have not given up hope of signing Verratti but know that the player is content with life in France and a transfer would be difficult to pull off this summer. Verratti delivered a masterclass against Barcelona in the Champions League last week. (Getty Images) 
Chelsea have been heavily linked with a move for Verratti , while reports in Italy suggest that PSG value the midfielder at €80 million (£68.2m). 
Verratti delivered a masterclass against Barcelona’s midfield in the Champions League last week, and after PSG’s 4-0 victory, the Italy international insisted he wanted to stay with the French club.
